DOC.criteria: Patients low risk MDS ( bone marrow blast percentage < 5 % ) Patients appropriate hematopoietic cell donor Adequate performance status ( Karnofsky score 70 ; see Appendix II ) Adequate hepatic renal function ( AST , ALT , bilirubin < 3.0 x upper normal limit , creatinine < 2.0 mg/dL ) . Adequate cardiac function ( left ventricular ejection fraction 40 % heart scan echocardiogram ) Signed date informed consent must obtain recipient donor .
